d:operatorScript.p: Move the mouse over the blue and purple shapes. Click the red circle on the top left. Move the mouse over the blue and purple shapes again.

d:passCriteria.p: For the test to pass the blue rectangles must always turn red on mouseover, and the ovals must turn red on mouseover only if pointer-events are set to "ALL". If a shape other than the one currently hovered turns red then the test has failed.

g.text: Rectangles should turn RED on mouseover
Ovals should turn RED if Pointer-Events are set to "ALL"
Purple ovals have Pointer-Events set to "NONE".
